snippet: Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland had three birdies on the closing nine en route to a 20-under-par 268 to win the BMW Championship by two strokes over Phil Mickelson and Lee Westwood.
abstract: Rory McIlroy wins the BMW Championship golf tournament, his second PGA Tour title in two weeks.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland had three birdies on the closing nine en route to a 20-under-par 268 to win the BMW Championship by two strokes over Phil Mickelson and Lee Westwood.

headline.seo: Rory McIlroy Wins BMW Championship Over Mickelson and Westwood
headline.main: Fighting Off Biggest Names, McIlroy Again Tops the List
headline.print_headline: Fighting Off Biggest Names, McIlroy Again Tops the List
